subtitles: 18143 20437 First, there was darkness.
22022 24900 Then came the Strangers.

24900 27611 They were a race
as old as time itself.

28779 31490 They had mastered
the ultimate technology--

31490 36703 the ability to alter
physical reality by will alone.

36703 39331 They called this ability
''Tuning.''
40582 42459 But they were dying.

42459 45587 Their civilization was
in decline,

45587 48257 and so they abandoned
their world,

48257 50884 seeking a cure
for their own mortality.

52344 55889 Their endless journey brought
them to a small, blue world...

55889 57975 in the farthest corner
of the galaxy.
59017 60477 Our world.

61520 63605 Here, they thought
they had finally found...

63605 65482 what they had been
searching for.

76326 79246 My name is
Dr. Daniel Poe Schreber.
80205 81832 l am just a man.

81832 85210 l help the Strangers
conduct their experiments.
86253 88338 l have betrayed my own kind.
295796 297589 You are confused, aren't you?

297589 300509 Frightened. That's all right.
l can help you.

300509 302094 -Who is this?
-l'm a doctor.

302094 304888 You must listen to me.
You have lost your memory.

304888 307099 There was an experiment.
Something went wrong.

307099 309268 Your memory was erased.
Do you understand me?

309268 311353 No, l don't understand.
What's going on here?

311353 314147 There are people coming for you
as we speak.

314147 316483 Don't let them find you.
Leave now.
317609 319778 Hello? Are you there?

362029 364531 Hey, Mr. Murdoch,
the Automat called.
364531 365991 Said you left your wallet there.

367034 370704 l suggest you retrieve it, since
you only paid for three weeks,
370704 372456 and they was up 10 minutes ago.
374541 376084 l've been here three weeks?

376084 379213 lt's right there
in black and white, Mr. Murdoch.
379213 381757 Day and date.

381757 385052 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.

385052 388096 -l'll take care of it later.
-See that you do.

388096 390265 Only thing makes you a guest
in this joint...
390265 391642 is cash on the barrelhead!

409576 412287 House rules.
Three weeks is three weeks.
412287 414790 No days off for good behavior.

425717 429513 Mr. Murdoch, yes?
Where is he?

429513 432933 He just left
not five minutes ago.

438689 442734 When the rumba rhythm
start to play
442734 444945 Dance with me
444945 448073 Make me sway
448073 452035 Like a lazy ocean hugs the shore
452035 454288 Hold me close
454288 457124 Sway me more

457124 461295 Like a flower bending
in the breeze
461503 463922 Bend with me
463922 466800 Sway with ease

466800 470762 When we dance,
you have a way with me
470762 473307 Stay with me
473307 475893 Sway with me

476602 480772 Hey, sweetie, he said he was
your husband's doctor.
480772 482274 He wanted to speak with you.

505714 507382 -Doctor...
-Schreber.

507382 511553 Please, won't you come in?
You must be Emma Murdoch.

512679 516141 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.
516141 517601 What is this?

517601 521271 A rather crude experiment
designed to further my studies.

521271 525025 l don't understand. You say
you're my husband's doctor,

525025 527611 but he never
mentioned you to me.

527611 530447 The truth is, John has been
coming to see me...
530447 531865 for quite some time.

531865 535327 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

535327 538455 stemming from
your marital difficulties.

538455 540332 -John told you what happened.
-Yes.

541708 543961 When was the last time
that you saw him?

543961 546880 Three weeks ago.
He packed a suitcase.
546880 549508 He was very angry at me.

549508 552302 l understand how difficult
this must be for you,
552302 553804 but for John's sake,

553804 556723 l would like you to think of me
as your friend, Emma.

556723 560435 lt appears that John
has suffered a psychotic break.

560435 563564 -Complete memory loss.
-You can't be serious.

563564 566608 Oh, but l am.
He may be delusional.
566608 567860 Even violent.

569236 573198 lf he were to contact you,
you must call me immediately.

573198 576118 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
577452 578579 For himself.

588797 592968 Good evening, Mr. Murdoch.
lt is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?
593635 597055 Mr. ''J'' something Murdoch?

600517 605063 J. Murdoch. What's your name?
Justin? Jerry?

608942 611111 My name's Jason Murdoch.
John Murdoch.

611111 614072 Jake Murdoch. How's it going?
Hi. Jack Murdoch.
619995 621788 Got to get a grip on myself.

645854 649316 l told the guy,
cash on the barrelhead.

649316 652653 l said, ''Listen,
three weeks is three weeks.''

652653 656615 -Where's our lucky winner?
-Upstairs, sir. Room 614.
657449 658784 The call girl.

663497 666375 -Evening, Husselbeck.
-lnspector Bumstead.
666375 668043 Your lace is untied.
679012 680681 Am l glad you're here, sir.

680681 683308 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

683308 685894 Just take what they give me,
Husselbeck.

716466 718927 -Thanks a lot.
-Excuse me.

721430 723098 -Hello?
-Oh, it's you.

723974 726685 -You left your wallet here.
-When did l do that?

726685 728854 -When you was last here.
-When was that?

728854 732733 When you left your wallet.
Expect me to remember?

738155 740824 -Excuse me!
-No, no, seriously.

758258 760135 -Where you headed, chief?
-Home.
760135 761512 And where's home?

761512 764306 Haven't you mugs got
anything better to do?
764306 766600 l'm just doing my job, May.
766600 768685 There's a killer out there.

768685 771730 Look for him
instead of cooling your heels.
774650 776401 Go on. Get out of here.

789623 792459 What's that make so far?
Six hookers in all?

792459 795796 -l believe so, sir.
-Give the man an ''A'' for effort.
800801 803095 So, Husselbeck,

803095 809643 what kind of killer do you think
stops to save a dying fish?

809643 811562 -Got me, sir.
-Bumstead.

811562 814857 What took you? This killer's
been running circles around us,
814857 816024 thanks to Walenski.

816024 817901 With all due respect,
Chief lnspector,

817901 820904 l've known Eddie a long time,
and he's a good cop.

820904 823198 Whatever kind of cop
Walenski once was...
823198 825200 he let drift a long time ago.
825200 826952 Let me talk to Bumstead!
826952 829037 Come on! Hold on!

833959 836044 -Get his arm !
-They're watching us!

836044 838338 -On your feet!
-There's no way out!
839798 841466 God, can't you see?

844928 847222 Let me go!
l'm not going to hurt you.

848765 850976 -What was that?
-Walenski.

859401 862529 l'm being punished
for my sins, right?

862529 866700 What did l ever do to inherit
this? Where do you begin?

866909 869828 Well, everything Detective
Walenski committed to paper...
869828 871288 should be here, so--

871288 874333 The only thing that should be
committed is Walenski.

876293 878170 Nothing like
a little healthy paranoia.

884635 888055 l came here to file a missing
persons report for my husband.

888055 891934 -Take it to the front desk.
-They told me to come see you.
893727 895354 His name's John Murdoch.

898482 901860 Do these names mean
anything to you?
902653 904655 Who are these women?

904655 906532 Why are you looking
for my husband?

906532 908825 Are you going to accuse him
of something?

908825 912371 -Maybe. Maybe murder.
-Whose murder?

913831 917084 -Which one?
-All of them.

918544 921839 Mrs. Murdoch, l am sorry.
l didn't mean to alarm you.

921839 924591 l'm sorry that l came.
l just made a mistake.

924591 928720 lf you'd please just give me
half a second to explain.
937813 938939 We met before?

940732 943777 lf we did,
l hope you're still breathing.
943777 945320 What's your name, honey?

949157 950951 Well, that's
an appropriate name.
958876 960127 l was just thinking.

967134 972222 lt seems kind of dangerous...
right now.

972222 974224 How do you know
l'm not the killer?

974224 977853 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

978395 980981 You feeling any urges
l should know about?

1041583 1045420 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1045420 1049591 -Who are you?
-We might ask the same question.

1132382 1135594 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.

1135594 1138722 -lt is said he is able to Tune.
-lmpossible!

1138722 1141850 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1141850 1144770 On occasion, the imprinting
does not take.

1144770 1147314 They behave erratically
when they awaken.

1147314 1151026 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1151026 1153278 But this one was different, yes?

1153278 1156990 -What has the doctor to say?
-He has failed to report in.

1156990 1160118 -And Mr. Quick?
-No more Mr. Quick.
1160118 1162746 Mr. Quick...dead, yes.
1166166 1168877 Poor, poor Mr. Quick.
1168877 1171797 Mr. Book...does he know?
1172756 1174842 Should we not know, Mr. Hand?

1175884 1178804 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1178804 1181807 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1181807 1184017 We must have this man.
1189940 1191108 My brand, l hope.
1203495 1205038 l've been worried about you.
1209001 1210377 Are you punishing me?

1211086 1213839 lf disappearing is
your way of punishing me,
1213839 1215048 l don't appreciate it.
1215048 1216216 What are you talking about?

1219761 1223932 l found these keys in my pocket,
so l assume l live here.

1225726 1228395 -You supposed to be my wife?
-''Supposed to be''?

1231523 1236028 You really...don't know
who l am, do you.

1236445 1239281 Your doctor called me. He was
worried that this might happen.

1243535 1247581 He gave me his card.
He's desperate to find you.

1255005 1256965 Feel like l'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1256965 1260427 What happened to me?
Why was l seeing a doctor?
1260427 1261887 l had an affair.
1263764 1265265 You were angry at me.

1268352 1271980 Closing time.
The pool is now closed.
1281698 1284076 Most unfortunate it is...

1284076 1286829 that we were forced
to seek you out here.

1287329 1291917 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this moisture.

1292417 1295754 -l'm sorry. l--
-Failed to report in, yes?

1295754 1298674 l was frightened.
l have a weak heart, you know.

1298674 1302261 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.
1302261 1304972 We found this in his hotel room.

1304972 1308600 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?

1308600 1310686 l tried to reprint him,
but he woke up.

1310686 1312980 He knocked the syringe
right out of my hand.

1312980 1316233 -He has no memories, then?
-Only fragments.

1316233 1317776 The procedure,
it was interrupted.

1317776 1320779 l guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.

1321196 1322990 You have had strays
before, right?

1322990 1326869 This is no stray, Doctor.
This one can Tune.

1326869 1329955 But that's impossible.
Only you have that ability.

1329955 1332249 You will process
another template...
1332249 1334459 of the subject's memories, yes?

1334459 1335919 Of course.
l'll imprint him again.

1337588 1340841 We require them
for a quite different purpose.

1340841 1343760 lt's almost midnight,
Dr. Schreber.

1343760 1345512 We'll talk again
after tonight's Tuning,
1345512 1348515 but no more delays, yes?

1348515 1353729 No more inconsistencies
in your behavior.
1355230 1356857 The police were looking for you.
1356857 1359067 l know. l saw the papers.

1359067 1361570 ''Killer stalks
city street-walkers.''
1365240 1367534 l was with one of those women.

1369077 1372539 -Before l came here tonight.
-l don't understand.

1372539 1377836 l met her outside an Automat.
l guess l wanted to test myself.

1379171 1382633 l wanted to know if l had it
in me to do those things.
1382633 1384092 Maybe l have lost my mind,

1384092 1387554 but whoever l am, l'm still me,
and l'm not a killer.
1393143 1394394 l believe you.

1402152 1404112 -What?
-The car outside.
1404112 1405656 The one you arrived in.

1405656 1407991 lt's a cop.
He dropped me off here.
1410077 1411829 l didn't know he was still here.
1415457 1416917 Hold it right there, mister!

1419336 1422381 -Wait. You have the wrong man.
-Stand aside, will you, please?
1422381 1423924 l didn't kill anyone.

1423924 1426218 Right now,
all you are is a suspect.

1426218 1429471 Turn yourself in. l'll listen
to whatever you have to say.

1429471 1431557 You won't believe
what l have to say.

1432683 1436019 -Try me.
-There's someone after me.

1436019 1439690 lt's this group of men.
They want me dead.

1439690 1442609 And l don't even know if...
they're not even--

1442609 1444903 Yeah, who's going to listen
to a madman?

1444903 1447281 -Stand aside, Mrs. Murdoch.
-Run!
1451660 1453620 No one ever listens to me.
1459918 1460961 Murdoch, stop!

1503921 1506632 -How much further?
-We're almost there, buddy.

1509760 1512137 You happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1512137 1515265 You're kidding! Me and the wife
spent our honeymoon there.

1515265 1518185 All you do is
take Main Street West to...

1520771 1524024 Or is it the Cross...
Now, that's funny.

1524024 1527152 l can't seem to remember
if it's Main Street West...
1527152 1528487 or the Crosstown.

1533200 1536245 l'm sorry, lnspector,
l cannot be of more assistance,

1536245 1538330 but l am running late
for an appointment.

1538330 1540415 Well, l appreciate you
taking the time.

1549132 1551552 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1551552 1556139 l've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.

1556139 1558976 Murdoch doesn't
strike me as one.

1558976 1562187 Perhaps you are not accustomed
to digging deep enough.

1562187 1565107 Well, l do know when
someone is lying to me, Doctor.

1565107 1569278 lnspector, judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1569278 1571363 Maybe you can give me
a few pointers.

1571363 1575325 Certainly.
Let's take you, for instance.

1575325 1578453 You are a fastidious man.
Driven.
1578453 1580831 Consumed by details.

1580831 1584418 l would say
your life is rather lonely.

1584418 1587337 Good evening, lnspector.
l really must be going.

1630797 1632549 -How is he?
-The same.
1633800 1636512 Walenski? lt's me, Frank.
1642893 1644061 Come in, Frank.
1647397 1648524 Close the door.

1656657 1659993 l've been looking through
some of your old reports.
1659993 1662079 lt's an interesting case.
1663121 1666333 Kind that make a man's career.

1668001 1671797 -Or break it.
-Yeah. l was on that case.

1671797 1675592 And then what?
What happened then, Eddie?
1675592 1677094 Nothing happened, Frank.

1678053 1680138 l've just been spending time
in the subway,
1680138 1682099 riding in circles.

1682099 1686061 Thinking in circles.
There's no way out.
1687938 1689606 l've been over this entire city.

1694111 1695946 You're scaring your wife
to death, Eddie.
1695946 1697447 She's not my wife.

1699324 1702327 l don't know who she is
or who any of us are.

1702327 1706081 -What makes you say that?
-You think about the past much?
1707749 1709251 As much as the next guy.

1710210 1713046 See, l've been trying
to remember things--

1713046 1716175 clearly remember things
from my past.

1716175 1718343 But the more
l try to think back,

1718343 1721388 the more it all starts
to unravel.
1721388 1722681 None of it seems real.

1722681 1726852 lt's like l've just
been dreaming this life,

1726852 1729855 and when l finally wake up,
l'll be somebody else,
1729855 1731857 somebody totally different.

1736195 1738280 You saw something,
didn't you, Eddie.
1739531 1742075 Something to do with the case.

1742576 1746038 There is no case!
There never was!

1746038 1750000 lt's all just a big joke!
lt's a joke!
1791083 1792835 Tonight's requirements are...
1792835 1796088 12 family photo albums,
1796088 1798549 nine personal diaries,
1800759 1803178 assorted childhood photographs,

1803178 1807349 requisite false l.D.s
and social security cards.
1807432 1809601 These do bring back memories.
1812020 1814314 This one is still warm.

1816316 1819528 The recollections of
a great lover?
1819528 1821822 A catalogue of conquests?
1822573 1823991 We will soon find out.

1825367 1826827 You wouldn't
appreciate that,

1826827 1830164 would you,
Mr. Whatever-your-name is?

1830164 1834877 Not the sort of conquest
you would ever understand.

1837796 1840465 A touch of
unhappy childhood...

1846221 1848682 A dash of
teenage rebellion...
1850392 1853520 And last but not least...

1853520 1856023 a tragic death
in the family.

1867576 1871246 Why does Murdoch not sleep
during the Tuning?

1871246 1875417 Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.
1875542 1876752 A freak of nature.

1876752 1879713 He's adapting to survive.
What do you expect?

1879713 1881590 Weren't you looking for
the human soul?

1881590 1884259 lsn't that the purpose
of your little zoo?

1884259 1887638 That's why you change people
and things every night.

1887638 1890557 Maybe you have finally
found what you are looking for,

1890557 1892100 and it's going to bite you
on your--

1896146 1898148 lt requires several
of your lifetimes...
1898148 1899816 to master our gifts.

1899816 1901652 The idea that
a simple man...

1901652 1903654 could develop the ability
to Tune is--
1903654 1904947 Absurd, l know.
1904947 1907241 What other explanation is there?
1959251 1960711 Shut it down.

1979271 1982399 Fredrickson says he'll take me
off the night shift.
1982399 1984276 lt's about time, dear.
2060269 2062479 Can anyone hear me?
2065649 2068402 Let the Tuning commence.
2228353 2229730 The Goodwins.
2229730 2231815 Charlie, Sylvia,
2231815 2233817 Jane, and little Matthew.
2237779 2239948 Jane and little Matthew.
2270062 2272397 The rich get richer.

2272397 2274566 Probably have
maid's quarters...

2274566 2275901 before the night
is through.
2329538 2331498 Dr. Schreber, l presume.

2334084 2336170 That's no way to greet
a patient, Doctor,
2336170 2338463 if that's what you are.
2339965 2341842 Why is everyone asleep?
2341842 2344219 Please keep your voice down.

2344219 2346180 l can't remember anything.
What have you done?
2346180 2349016 Nothing. l want to help you.

2349016 2352436 We cannot talk here.
lf they see us together--

2352436 2355355 l don't care.
l want some answers. Now!

2355355 2358609 Who are they?
Why are they trying to kill me?

2365908 2368911 -You really can do it.
-l did that?

2368911 2371622 Listen to me.
You have their power.

2371622 2373624 You can make things happen
by will alone.
2373624 2375292 They call it ''Tuning.''

2375292 2377294 That is how they change
the buildings.

2377294 2379755 Just now you acted
out of self-defense,

2379755 2382591 but l can teach you
to control your power.

2382591 2386762 We can stop them.
We can take the city back.

2445696 2448073 He made a terrible impression
for the firm,

2448073 2450909 lollygagging around
as he did.

2450909 2453829 So l told Fredrickson
l was letting him go.
2453829 2455789 Well you should have, darling.

2456498 2460169 He attacked me.
l don't know where he's gone.

2460169 2464131 Come, Dr. Schreber.
We have much to do.

2469136 2475601 They say that
you're a runaround lover
2476643 2484651 Though you say it isn't so

2487613 2494495 But if you put me down
for another
2496038 2501877 l'll know, believe me, l'll know

2503337 2507007 Tonight's experiment will
take place in these locations.

2507007 2511053 The first subject
shall be imprinted on Avenue M.
2511053 2514097 Mr. Book, there is a problem.
2514097 2515766 There is no Avenue M.

2515766 2517601 We were unable
to complete it.

2517601 2521188 During the last Tuning,
we detected a lack of control.

2521188 2524399 An opposing influence
on the machines?

2524399 2528570 This man Murdoch is
more powerful than we thought.
2528654 2530656 He is becoming like us.
2530656 2534117 So we must become like him.
2534993 2537454 The doctor has done as we asked?

2537454 2541500 The life and times
of John Murdoch, volume two.
2543043 2545754 We must not do this.

2545754 2549091 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2549091 2552010 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?

2552010 2555472 Everywhere he goes,
everyone he seeks out...
2555472 2556723 will be known to us.

2556723 2561937 And as he follows the clues,
so shall we follow the memories.
2561937 2564439 But to imprint one of us?
2564439 2567151 Failure has always resulted.

2567151 2570821 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
2577828 2579746 This may sting a bit.
2620412 2624291 l have John Murdoch in mind.

2626585 2630631 ''Found this postcard
among your mother's things.

2630631 2632841 ''Brings back memories,
doesn't it?
2632841 2634801 ''Stop by sometime.

2634801 2638055 ''We'll see if we can't
hook ourselves another mermaid.
2638055 2640432 ''Love to Emma. Karl.''
2648774 2650359 Karl Harris.

2667876 2671004 Excuse me.
Which way is Avenue C?
2671004 2672256 Try the subway.
2676009 2677553 You got a problem, pal?
2677553 2680389 Been working here long?

2680389 2684142 25 years.
No days off for good behavior.
2708834 2711879 We're looking for John Murdoch.

2746079 2748165 She knows nothing,
Mr. Hand.
2748165 2750042 A dead end, Mr. Wall.

2750042 2752836 We thought his imprint
would let us track him.

2752836 2755464 But instead
we have been brought here.

2755464 2759551 -This is irrational.
-lnstincts are irrational.

2759551 2762846 We must follow
where they lead, yes?

2762846 2766099 Mr. Sleep suggests he may go
to places familiar.
2767476 2769561 He does not care about our job.
2769561 2772481 lndulge us, Mr. Hand.
2772481 2775150 lf you were Murdoch, yes?
2775150 2778529 lf l were Murdoch...

2780280 2783826 l would remember how
my wife had hurt me...
2783826 2785828 by sleeping with another man.

2790833 2794711 l would look for a way
to hurt her in return.

2797256 2802177 Leave me alone with her.
There's work to be done.

2805514 2807599 All change,
platform three.

2811478 2813730 Excuse me, how do l get
to the end of the line?
2813730 2815232 You want the Express.
2827828 2830372 How come the train didn't stop?
2830372 2831582 That's the Express.
2833250 2835127 There's no way out.

2835127 2838338 You can't get out of the city.
l've tried.
2839089 2841175 You're Murdoch, aren't you?

2841175 2842968 The one
they've been looking for.
2842968 2844094 You're not a killer.

2844094 2846805 They set you up with
a fake identity,
2846805 2848473 like everyone else here.

2848473 2850434 -Who are you?
-l was a cop.
2850434 2853562 At least in this life l was.
2853562 2856482 They steal peoples' memories.

2856482 2858358 Then they swap them around
between us.

2858358 2861111 l seen them do it,
back and forth...

2861111 2863280 till no one knows
who they are anymore.
2863280 2864615 How do you know all this?

2864615 2866408 Once in a while one of us
wakes up...
2866408 2867868 while they're changing things.

2868785 2871330 lt's not supposed to happen,
but it does.
2871330 2872581 lt happened to me.
2873290 2875292 They'll come looking for you.

2876418 2878712 Just like they'll come
looking for me.
2880172 2881423 l figured a way out.
2892809 2894019 They were here.
2897606 2899900 This was to be his home.
2902486 2904363 That was when we loved her.
2904363 2906782 This is all well and good,

2906782 2908700 but we require
a more practical link...
2908700 2910828 to his present whereabouts.
2915415 2917501 And l know where to find her.

2925926 2929304 We're very lucky,
when you think about it.

2930347 2932432 To be able to revisit
those places...

2932432 2934393 which meant
so very much to us.

2935185 2937813 l thought we were haunted
by them.

2939606 2942109 There used to be a ferry
when l was a boy.
2942109 2944194 Biggest thing you ever saw.

2944194 2946989 Lit up like
a floating birthday cake.

2948490 2951076 That's just what my husband
once said to me.
2951076 2952661 On this very spot.
2954079 2956165 Where is your husband now?

2956165 2960169 l wish l knew.
What brings you here?
2960169 2962963 l met my wife at this place.
2962963 2965257 lt's where l met my husband.
2965257 2966842 Small world.
3069319 3071196 What are you doing here?
3071196 3072781 l've been following you.
3076702 3078370 Hold it right there!
3084626 3086003 lt's been so damn long,

3086003 3088505 l thought you'd forgotten
your Uncle Karl.
3089339 3090674 You son of a gun!

3102269 3104480 -ls that me?
-Yeah.

3112696 3114573 Shell Beach is where
l grew up?

3114573 3117159 That's what l said.
Shell Beach.

3117159 3119703 -Your home town.
-l need to get there.
3119703 3120746 How do l get there?

3122164 3125125 l don't know.
l haven't been there in years.

3125125 3128337 You must remember.
You must have some idea.
3129922 3131173 Sorry, Johnny.

3132591 3135511 The old cracker barrel
ain't what it used to be.

3138972 3142809 -lt was so bright there.
-Brighter times, l guess.

3144186 3147523 You were always scribbling
in that damn book.
3147523 3149525 That's me and your Pa.

3149525 3151902 What a couple of
handsome fools.
3151902 3153362 What happened to my parents?
3155948 3157115 Where are they now?
3158367 3160118 They're dead, Johnny.

3160118 3162955 They died when the house
burned down.
3162955 3164540 l looked after you.

3165457 3167209 You don't remember that,
really?
3170045 3172548 What's that? What is that?

3180347 3183100 You burned your arm pretty bad
in the fire.
3188272 3189857 What does it mean?
3189857 3191859 lt means these are all lies!

3195863 3198323 My husband told me
he'd been here.

3198323 3201118 He told me he wanted
to test himself.
3214673 3216550 l wanted to talk to her.

3216550 3218552 l thought she could
help me find him.
3220179 3222181 l'm going to call the station.
3238447 3239573 lt's beautiful.
3242284 3245120 lt was a gift from my mother.
3245120 3246663 She died recently.

3248165 3250334 l keep it with me
to remind me of her.
3257216 3259426 lt's a funny thing, though.

3259426 3262221 l can't remember
when she gave it to me.

3264306 3267226 How do you think l could
forget a thing like that?
3268268 3270771 What's happening, lnspector?
3270771 3272564 l'm not sure l know anymore.

3276527 3278278 l left your old room
like it was.
3279321 3281615 You can sleep here tonight.
3281615 3283826 Glad to have you back, Johnny.

3283826 3286537 -Even if it is for just a night.
-Karl.

3287663 3290374 -ls that the right time?
-Why, sure.

3290374 3292876 That clock's kept perfect time
since l bought it.

3295921 3298298 -What do you think?
-l don't understand.

3298298 3301134 How can it be night already?
What happened to the day?

3301134 3303595 You're tired.
Anything's possible.
3305305 3306348 Get some sleep.

3306348 3308725 We'll straighten all this out
tomorrow.

3362529 3365532 He's here.
He's acting peculiar.
3365532 3367951 l know. He's not himself.

3367951 3370162 Keep him there,
and l'll be right over.

3370162 3372331 -l'll try.
-Thanks. Bye.

3375876 3379630 l can't promise anything.
We'll play it as it comes.
3380047 3382841 We just wanted to help.
3389556 3393268 Karl. Uncle Karl.

3393268 3397147 lf you're in trouble,
maybe we can do something.
3398190 3400692 Haven't seen you in so long.

3475267 3480272 Mr. Murdoch, you've been
the cause of much distress.

3484735 3487237 -Start talking.
-There's no need for this.

3487237 3490782 There's no escape.
The city's ours. We made it.
3490782 3492242 What are you talking about?

3492242 3495370 We fashioned this city
on stolen memories.

3495370 3499124 Different eras, different pasts,
all rolled into one.

3499124 3503170 Each night we revise it,
refine it, in order to learn.

3503170 3506298 -Learn what?
-About you.

3506298 3510469 You and your fellow inhabitants.
What makes you human.

3510719 3514139 -Why?
-We need to be like you.
3514973 3517142 l understand you now.

3517142 3520813 l remember that which you do
not, what you've been missing.

3520813 3526443 The ocean, yes? Running along
the waves as a child.

3526443 3531365 Meeting Emma at the river,
that first kiss that followed.

3531865 3535118 -What are you?
-You've seen what we are.
3535118 3537579 We use your dead as vessels.

3683809 3687771 -What about her? Ring a bell?
-She was alive when l left her.

3687771 3690899 -What about this?
-This is nothing.

3690899 3693068 lt must mean something--
all those pictures.
3693068 3694111 What pictures?

3695571 3698490 -l don't understand this.
-Stop playing games with me.

3698490 3700993 -Stop telling me lies.
-l am not telling lies!

3700993 3703412 Help me out.
Make me understand.

3703412 3708417 l have this jigsaw puzzle in
my face, and it makes no sense.

3708417 3711712 You think it makes sense to me?
l'm as confused as you are.

3711712 3715716 Let me ask you a question.
Have you heard of Shell Beach?

3715716 3717885 -Sure.
-You know how to get there?

3720179 3725434 -Right. You just go to the...
-Where? Where do you go?
3725434 3727060 Give me a second, will you?
3729021 3730606 You can't remember, can you?
3732065 3734443 Thinking that's kind of odd?
3735736 3737905 Wait. l got a better one.

3737905 3742075 When was the last time you
did something during the day?

3742201 3745621 -What do you mean?
-l just mean during the day.

3746455 3749166 Daylight. When was the last
time you remember seeing it?

3749166 3752920 l'm not talking about a distant,
half-forgotten childhood memory.

3752920 3756048 l mean, like, yesterday.
Last week? When?
3756673 3758467 Do you have a single memory?
3760219 3761970 You don't, do you?

3761970 3767518 l don't think the sun
even exists in this place.

3767518 3772314 'Cause l've been up for hours
and hours, and night never ends.

3772314 3774733 -That's crazy.
-You're damn right it's crazy.

3774733 3778237 But listen to me, Bumstead.
lt's not just me.

3778237 3781281 lt's all of us. They're doing
something to all of us.

3781281 3783158 Shut up.
l've heard enough.

3783158 3785869 -Please listen--
-Shut up!
3796296 3799007 There has to be an explanation.
3806390 3807432 Explain this.

3831832 3834877 l never meant to hurt you.
l don't know why l did.
3834877 3836545 l wish l could take it back.
3837254 3839673 You didn't do it.
3839673 3841425 This affair of yours,

3841425 3844469 whatever you think you've done,
you didn't do it.
3844469 3845721 l don't believe it happened.

3845721 3849558 -What do you mean?
-This will sound crazy.

3849558 3852811 What if we never knew
each other before now?

3852811 3859067 What if the first time we met
was last night in our apartment?
3859067 3861778 And everything you remember,

3861778 3865032 and everything l'm supposed to
remember never really happened.

3865032 3867493 Someone just wants us
to think it did.
3868452 3870037 But how can that be true?

3870621 3873540 l so vividly remember
meeting you.

3874917 3877336 l remember falling in love
with you.

3878879 3881798 -l remember losing you.
-Time's up.

3883467 3888138 No, wait, please.
Just one more minute.
3894728 3896188 l love you, John.

3899650 3901819 You can't fake something
like that.
3934268 3936728 lnspector? Sir?

3938188 3941358 Detective Walenski
killed himself last night.
3943277 3944695 l thought you should know.

3947364 3951577 The chief wanted to see you.
Sir?

3958542 3960502 l knew you'd track
the killer down.

3990240 3993869 -How can we help you, sir?
-You can sleep.

4016391 4020354 l wanted to be the first to
congratulate you about the case.
4022564 4025484 Take us to Murdoch.
4056974 4058642 l knew you'd come eventually.

4058642 4061019 lsn't it time
you gave me some answers?

4062396 4065482 Yes, of course.
Won't you please sit down?
4068443 4070320 l come here often.

4070320 4073323 lt's one of the few places
l'm allowed some peace.

4073323 4076785 You see, they have
an aversion to water.

4077411 4079371 One could almost call it
a phobia.

4079830 4082499 Who are they?
What do they want from me?

4084209 4089006 For now, let's say you're
the subject of their experiment.

4092134 4097931 l'm sorry, but l have no time
to do this the right way.

4097931 4102019 Everything you need to know
is in this syringe.

4102019 4105689 l need you to inject yourself.
lt's the only way to understand.

4105689 4108484 -You're kidding, right?
-We're running out of time!

4108484 4112112 -You have to do this now.
-Give me the gun.

4112112 4114448 He's more disturbed
than we thought.

4114448 4117242 l may not be the judge
of personality you are,

4117242 4120245 but you're the one
who looks disturbed.

4120245 4122789 You don't know what
you're doing.
4124041 4128003 What exactly is in this, Doctor?

4129630 4133217 All the answers you've been
looking for, l swear to you.

4134718 4140474 Guess l'll hold on to it for
safekeeping, if you don't mind.
4140474 4141892 Let's go, Doctor.
4143393 4146522 Go? Where are we going?
4146980 4148732 Shell Beach.

4149775 4153737 That's where you wanted to go,
isn't it, the ocean?

4162162 4165624 Won't find anything there.
l've been there--
4165624 4168001 Then you can show us the way.

4168001 4171672 l won't. l refuse.
You can't make me go there.

4171672 4174508 Don't you understand?
They'll be waiting for us.

4183433 4188230 l don't understand.
There used to be a bridge here.

4193277 4196363 Try that again, and your friends
will find you in the canal.

4196363 4198157 Don't hurt me.
l'll tell you everything.

4198157 4199950 lt doesn't matter anymore
anyway.
4211211 4212754 Who are you people?

4213130 4215966 Must go to the end
of the canal.

4217342 4220387 We will give you some more
pretty things soon...

4221096 4223390 -Anna.
-l'm not Anna.
4225058 4227144 You will be soon, yes.

4231398 4234234 l have another use
for her first.
4243744 4245579 l call them Strangers.

4246246 4248624 They abducted us
and brought us here.

4249875 4254046 This city, everyone in it...
is their experiment.

4254254 4257090 They mix and match our memories
as they see fit,

4257090 4259676 trying to divine
what makes us unique.

4260219 4263138 One day, a man might be
an inspector.

4263138 4265808 The next,
someone entirely different.

4266266 4269686 When they want to study
a murderer, for instance,

4269686 4274149 they simply imprint one of their
citizens with a new personality.

4274149 4278362 Arrange a family for him,
friends, an entire history...
4278570 4280447 even a lost wallet.
4280447 4282533 Then they observe the results.

4283867 4288455 Will a man, given the history of
a killer, continue in that vein?

4288455 4292084 Or are we, in fact, more than
the sum of our memories?

4292084 4297297 This business of you being
a killer was a sad coincidence.

4297297 4299925 You have had dozens of lives
before now.
4299925 4301385 You happened to wake up...

4301385 4304304 while l was imprinting you
with this one.
4304304 4306306 Why are they doing all this?

4306306 4310435 lt is our capacity for
individuality, our souls...

4310435 4312354 that makes us different
from them.

4312354 4314815 They think they'll find
the human soul...

4314815 4317651 if they understand
how our memories work.

4317651 4322156 They have collective memories.
They share one group mind.

4322156 4327035 They're dying. Their race is
on the brink of extinction.

4327035 4330038 -They think we can save them.
-Where do l fit in?

4330038 4334960 You're different. You resisted
my attempt to imprint you.

4339548 4342968 Somehow, you have developed
their ability to Tune.

4342968 4346305 That is how they change things,
how they built this city.

4346305 4349224 They have machines buried
beneath the surface...

4349224 4353187 that allow them to focus
their telepathic energies.

4353520 4356231 They control everything here,
even the sun.

4356231 4359443 That's why it's always dark.
They can't stand the light.
4359443 4360944 Why do they need you?
4360944 4362905 When they first brought us here,

4362905 4367075 they extracted what was in us
and stored the information,
4367284 4369286 remixed it like paint...

4369286 4371747 and gave us back
new memories of their choosing.

4371747 4375834 But they still needed an artist
to help them.

4377211 4382216 l understood the human mind
better than they ever could,

4382216 4385844 so they allowed me to keep
my skills as a scientist...
4385844 4387304 because they needed them.

4387304 4389723 They made me delete
everything else.

4398232 4402861 Can you imagine what it's like
to erase your own past?

4402861 4406490 What about my past?
What about my childhood?
4407032 4408992 Shell Beach. Uncle Karl.

4410244 4414414 What about this?
This was blank when l found it.

4414414 4418293 You still don't understand.
You were never a boy.
4418293 4419628 Not in this place.

4419628 4422548 Your history is an illusion,
a fabrication,
4422548 4424424 as it is with all of us.

4424424 4427052 You made those drawings happen
with your gift.
4427052 4428512 You say they brought us here.
4435686 4438814 l'm sorry. l don't remember.

4439731 4443902 None of us remember that...
what we once were...

4443902 4447865 what we might have been...
somewhere else.

4465299 4469178 l've taken you this far.
You don't need me anymore.
4515599 4517768 There is no ocean, John.
4519019 4521188 There's nothing beyond the city.
4522856 4525234 The only place home exists...
4527528 4529112 is in your head.
4576535 4578620 Now you know the truth.

4638180 4640891 You'll allow yourself
to surrender...

4640891 4643310 or it will result in
this one's death.
4643310 4644436 What do l care?

4644853 4647064 She's not my real wife.
She's nothing to me.

4647064 4651735 But you do still care,
don't you, Mr. Murdoch?

4651735 4656323 l have become the monster
you were intended to be.

4657991 4661829 Shall l end her life now,
as you would have?

4665082 4670712 -Don't hurt her, please.
-Then surrender.
4718969 4722556 He is powerful, yes, dangerous.

4722556 4725851 But he can also lead us
to what we seek...
4725851 4729104 what the doctor calls the soul.

4729104 4733066 lt is time for our experiment
to move into a final phase.

4733066 4735903 We no longer need
the other subjects.
4735903 4739323 The time for study is over.

4739323 4743494 lt is time to be one
with John Murdoch.
4750459 4753795 lt is time, Doctor. lmprint.
4756423 4758592 Shut it down!
4759551 4761929 Shut it down forever.
4776652 4777694 What are you doing?

4778654 4783742 They want to imprint you with
their own collective memories.

4784493 4786662 They want to make you
one of them...
4786662 4788872 so they can share your soul.
4788872 4791250 But l've got other plans.

4794586 4797506 lmprint, Doctor.
No more disobedience.

4797506 4802594 l'm sorry. The pain will
only last a moment.
4813272 4814898 Remember, John.

4815983 4818068 You'll rise to greater heights
than that.

4818068 4820946 One day when you're older,
you'll understand.

4824199 4827119 That's it, John.
Practice makes perfect.

4827119 4830664 Now, remember what l told you.
Never talk to strangers.
4830664 4832207 John, remember.

4832207 4835043 You're probably wondering why l
keep appearing in your memories.

4835043 4837546 lt's because l have
inserted myself in them.

4837546 4841633 They were fabricated to
teach you about the Strangers.

4841633 4845053 Give you a lifetime of knowledge
in a single syringe.

4847514 4852227 You will survive, John. You'll
find strength within yourself.
4852227 4853812 And you will prevail.

4856315 4858484 -Hi, Uncle Karl.
-Johnny!

4861403 4866241 Getting the hang of it, John.
Maybe one day l'll work for you.

4866241 4869870 Here's the machine the Strangers
use to amplify their thoughts,

4869870 4871622 the machine that changes
their world.

4871622 4874958 You must take control of it.
You must make the machine yours.

4874958 4879963 l know you can beat them,
but you must concentrate.
4881548 4882800 Something's wrong.
4891558 4893560 There is no time for romance.

4893560 4895646 The world can be
what you make it.
4896688 4897731 What have you done?

4898774 4900943 You have the power
to make anything happen...
4900943 4902945 but you must act now.

5187146 5191316 l knew you could do it, John.
You have their power now.

5191525 5194236 -You control their machines.
-Where's Emma?

5194987 5199449 She's not Emma anymore.
She has been reimprinted.

5199449 5201743 -So give her back her memories.
-l can't.

5201743 5206248 The facility where they stored
the memories has been destroyed.
5209084 5211086 What are you going to do now?
5214047 5215549 l'm gonna fix things.

5217217 5220846 You told me l had the power,
didn't you?

5221472 5224808 l can make these machines
do anything l want.

5225434 5227853 Make this world
anything l want it to be.

5228770 5232941 Just so long as l concentrate
hard enough.
5316441 5317609 Where are you going?
5321155 5322114 Shell Beach.

5363489 5365073 -What's the fare?
-A quarter.
5421880 5423757 Been waiting for you, yes?

5424466 5428637 -What are you doing?
-l'm just making a few changes.

5428846 5433767 -We're sure that's what we want?
-l'll take my chances.

5433767 5439606 l'm dying, John. Your imprint
is not agreeable with my kind.

5439606 5441775 But l wanted to know
what it was like.
5443569 5445279 How you feel.

5445279 5447948 You know how l was
supposed to feel.

5447948 5452119 That person isn't me.
Never was.

5452119 5455664 You wanted to know what it was
that makes us human.

5456373 5460586 Well, you're not going to
find it in here.

5461837 5463547 You went looking
in the wrong place.
5562855 5564648 lt's so beautiful here.

5577661 5580080 Do you know if Shell Beach
is around here?
5580455 5582791 l think that's it over there.
5601018 5602978 l'm headed that way myself.
5604980 5606356 Would you like to join me?

5615908 5619578 l'm Anna, by the way.
What's your name?
5622706 5624583 John Murdoch.
